title: London Knees 1966
medium: Multiple of polyurethaned latex “knees,” acrylic base, two sewn felt bags, and twelve photolithographs in three folders; housed in cloth-covered case
dimensions: overall (case, closed): 7 1/2 x 17 x 11 5/8" (19 x 43.2 x 29.5 cm)
credits: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Lester Francis Avnet
